Dwarf Adventurer Droph:
Welcome, traveler! I long time study this place and have found which that interesting, bound to ancient Giants. Them remains not so much and they store secret of Giant Praim. Having studied all data, I have come to a conclusion that if to collect all parts of the manuscript it is possible to find and Praim.
You wouldn't like to help me with the collecting of manuscripts? Then, I could thank you generously.
"Yes I will help"
"No, thanks"
